str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
A space of time or interval; by extension, an individual opportunity; by implication, delay.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From para and erchomai; to come near or aside, i.e. To approach, go by, perish or neglect, avert.

parse: Verb - Perfect Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: From kata and ergazomai; to work fully, i.e. Accomplish; by implication, to finish, fashion.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Will, counsel, purpose. From boulomai; a resolve.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Plural

str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From a compound of a and a presumed selges; licentiousness.
Desire, eagerness for, inordinate desire, lust. From epithumeo; a longing.
Drunkenness, debauchery. From oinos and a form of the base of phluaros; an overflow of wine, i.e. Vinolency.
A feasting, reveling, carousal. From keimai; a carousal.
A drinking, carousing. From the alternate of pino; a drinking-bout or carousal.
Illegal, unlawful, criminal, lawless. By implication, flagitious.
Service (worship) of an image (an idol). From eidolon and latreia; image-worship.
